message: this board turn on, but fan keeps restarting; not video;any history=initially it does not turn on, it had a short in c7043, it was removed but I am left with the restart fan problem
Just fan restarts, or all power rails?
all power rails restart, except  PPVCORE_S0_CPU_REG(l7510)
ALL_SYS_PWRGD is pulsing, u2750 and u2760 signals is good PM_PCH_SYS_PWROK is pulsing.

"PM_PCH_SYS_PWROK is pulsing"
Then you must have pulse at L7510 too.
Be sure R7402 is good.

Did you try SMC bypass?
PLT_RESET_L pulsing?

Excuse me  pulse is not in l7550, in l7510 is pulsando.PLT_RESET_L is pulsing.Yes try smc bypass persist problem.excuse me PP3V42_G3H_REG =3.42 constant,  PPBUS_G3H =8.4 constant,   PP3V3_S5_REG=3.3v constant.  PP5V_S3_REG =pulsing

Check all voltages from page 22.
Pay atention to series resistors and coils.
Do the same for pages 59 & 60.

Also test the board alone, without LIO flex connected.

Sorry, I don't know if I edited the answer after you answered me, make sure it is so
